briefTitle: Myofascial Induction in Breast Cancer Survivors
officialTitle: Randomized, Single-blind, Placebo-controlled Cross-over Design of Myofascial Induction and Placebo Electrotherapy in Breast Cancer Survivors
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* had a diagnosis of breast cancer (cancer stage I-IIIA)
* was between the ages of 25 and 65
* had completed adjuvant therapy except hormonal treatment

Exclusion Criteria:

* had cancer recurrence
